Html:
Dear Sir/Madam

I am using Getroute by OpenstreetMapProvider

MapRoute mroute = GMap.NET.MapProviders.OpenStreetMapProvider.Instance.GetRoute(locationStart, locationEnd, false, false, 15);

but I get this error

An exception of type 'System.NotImplementedException' occurred in GMap.NET.Core.dll but was not handled in user code

Additional information: use GetRoute(PointLatLng start, PointLatLng end...

I cannot continue my work. Please let me know how to fix this
